props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: controlClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name for control component.

description.text: Specifies class name for control component.

props.name: labelClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name for label component.

description.text: Specifies class name for label component.

props.name: description
props.docblock: Specifies description to show under the radio's value.

description.text: Specifies description to show under the radio's value.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display component in invalid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display component in invalid state, this affects styling.

props.name: isValid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display component in valid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display component in valid state, this affects styling.
